get.description: gets the status of an autopi related task. In future could be other tasks too?
gets the information about the autopi by the unitId
gets whether the autopi is online right now, if already paired with a user, makes sure user has access. returns json with {"online": true/false}

post.description: checks to see if autopi unit needs to be updated, and starts update process if so.

get.description: gets a specific device definition by make model and year
gets a specific device definition by id, adds autopi integration on the fly if does not have it and year > cutoff
returns a json tree of Makes, models, and years
gets all the available integrations for a device definition. Includes the capabilities of the device with the integration
gets all documents associated with current user - pulled from token

post.description: post document by id associated with current user - pulled from token

parameters.description: The file to upload. file is required
parameters.name: file

parameters.description: The document name. name is required
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: The document type. type is required
parameters.name: type

get.description: get document by id associated with current user - pulled from token

delete.description: delete document associated with current user - pulled from token

get.description: download document associated with current user - pulled from token
gets list of integrations we have defined
retrieves NFT metadata for a given tokenID
retrieves NFT metadata for a given tokenID

post.description: adds a device to a user. can add with only device_definition_id or with MMY, which will create a device_definition on the fly

parameters.description: add device to user. either MMY or id are required
parameters.name: user_device

post.description: Closed off in prod. Submit a raw autopi command to unit. Device must be registered with autopi before this can be used

get.description: gets the status of an autopi raw command by jobID

post.description: Submit credentials for registering a device with a given integration.

get.description: gets all devices associated with current user - pulled from token

delete.description: delete the user device record (hard delete)

get.description: Returns the data the user must sign in order to mint this device.

post.description: Sends a mint device request to the blockchain
Starts the process of refreshing device status from Smartcar

patch.description: updates the CountryCode on the user device record

get.description: Receive status updates about a Smartcar integration

patch.description: updates the Name on the user device record

get.description:
Returns the latest status update for the device. May return 404 if the
user does not have a device with the ID, or if no status updates have come

patch.description: updates the VIN on the user device record

get.description: gets all geofences for the current user

post.description: adds a new geofence to the user's account, optionally attached to specific user_devices

put.description: updates an existing geofence for the current user

delete.description: hard deletes a geofence from db

userDeviceIds.description: Optionally link the geofence with a list of user device ID

createdAt.description: CreatedAt is the creation time of this integration for this device.

externalId.description:
ExternalID is the identifier used by the third party for the device. It may be absent if we
haven't authorized yet.

imageData.description: ImageData contains the base64-encoded NFT PNG image.

signature.description: Signature is the hex encoding of the EIP-712 signature result.

code.description: Code is an OAuth authorization code. Not used in all integrations.

externalId.description: ExternalID is the only field needed for AutoPi registrations. It is the UnitID.

redirectURI.description: RedirectURI is the OAuth redirect URI used by the frontend. Not used in all integrations.

userDeviceIds.description: Optionally link the geofence with a list of user device ID
